name: System Intrusion (itch)
description:
Your home down has been besieged by a battalion of military drones as part of a live fire exercise to test out the latest generation of military AI supercomputers.  Hack into the system and destroy the AI's kernel to save your town from annihilation, but be careful.  The system has it's own internal defenses and they don't like intruders.

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look/Aim

LMB - Shoot

Music was taken from a submission to AssetJam #8 by Julian Jarboe (https://sissyfist.itch.io/):  https://itch.io/jam/asset-jam-8/rate/599838
